text: Arau mucha'i yetiya amara nirdharaita samayata upasthita ha’la arau te'omra pratipalake te'omra lagata katha patile, tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Tumi moka darsana diya, ma'i tomaka dekhima’. Te'om ka’le, ‘tumi moka dekhiba noraaraiba. Tumi baram paharara phale'i coraacona, se'ito yadi nijara tha'ite sthira thake teneha’le tumi moka dekhiba paraiba’. Yetiya te'omra pratipalake paharata jyoti prakasa karaile tetiya i paharaka curna-bicurna karaile arau mucha sanjnahina hai paraile. Yetiya te'om jnana ubhati pale tetiya ka’le, ‘mahimamaya tumi, ma'i anutapta hai tomara ocarata ta'oba karaicho arau muminasakalara majata maye'i prathama’
